short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickPin for Perfetto UI：“Configuration process， Automatic pin ，Saving time，Improving efficiency”

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write the commonly used thread names into a configuration file. After importing it, you can quickly pin and observe them on the Perfetto website.
